name: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Strata
author: Serenity
summary: Eggs combine with cheese, bacon, and bread to become a fluffy cheese strata that no one can resist! This is an easy recipe for guys who want to surprise that special someone with breakfast in bed!
ingredients: 12 thick slices white bread, cut into 1 inch cubes
directions: Toss cubed bread with bacon, cheese, and mushrooms, and pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish
Whisk together eggs, half-and-half, and mustard until smooth, then pour evenly over cubed bread
Cover dish with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Remove plastic wrap from the baking dish, and bake strata in preheated oven until the top is golden brown, and the eggs are set, about 1 hour
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving
